name: karma-oojspec
description: A Karma plugin - adapter for oojspec testing framework.
author: Frederico Schardong <frede.sch@gmail.com>

scripts.prepare: git clone git@github.com:karma-runner/karma.git && cd karma && npm install && npm run init && npm run build && cd ../node_modules && rm -rf karma && ln -s ../karma && cd node_modules/.bin && ln -s ../karma/bin/karma
